title: InfectiousAgentClass
description: Enumeration of classes of infectious agents, e.g., bacteria, viruses, fungi, protozoa, prions, or multicellular parasites. Used to categorize the causative agent of an InfectiousDisease.

name.description: The name of the infectious agent class.

description.description: A human-readable description of the infectious agent class.

sameAs.description: URL of a reference Web page that unambiguously indicates the class identity, such as a Wikipedia entry.

url.description: A URL that unambiguously identifies this class.

taxon_id.description: Taxon ID for this infectious agent class.

country.description: Name of the country where sample was collected.

run_accession.description: Unique identifier assigned to a specific set of raw sequencing data files from a single sequencing event.

experiment_title.description: Brief, descriptive, human-readable title for a specific sequencing experiment. .
